divs: Sighting DetailsName brianE-Mail bri4ent@aol.comSubject a real ufo sighting. a question.Body of Messagea few years ago myself and two friends were traveling to bethesda, ma. along theway and within a mile of wright pat. afb. i had to pull over to relieve myself.i was standing on the highway side of a ford bronco and one of my friends was onthe ditch side doing said same. we were about 15 feet east of a highwayoverpass. while i was relieving myself i started to look around. i looked up andto my right over my shoulder and hovering with absolutely no audible sound wasan object approx. 25 feet wide with what looked like a rounded curved front. iam not certain how deep top to bottom or long it was. it had a couple of lightsbut i cant really recall their color other than at the time acknowledging thatthey were lights. then i recall the strangest feeling came over me. i rememberrealising that i was looking at a ufo and this is still difficult to relate butat the same time something came over me and i didnt think seeing what lookedlike a bonifide ufo was such a big deal. i looked at the object for approx. 7-10seconds, got in the bronco, and we headed on our way. later that night it hitme. apparently my mind was able to shake off the control the object had assertedon me. i believe and this is where it realy gets difficult that the object was aufo and that it was emitting some kind of mind erase beam on us fogging ourminds and making us downplay or forget the incident. my friend john never didremember the object till a few months later when i brought up the subject. iasked him if he remembered seeing anything strange on the trip out east he said, no, not other than that ufo. the mind erase beam apparently still had a hold onhim because he didnt understand how amazing or of import his comment was. then itold him, john, do you realize what you are saying he got this weird confusedlook on his face. then it all came back. he described without any prompting onmy behalf seeing very closely what i saw. so, my question to the board is this.has there ever been such a situation reported on this board i have been thinkingabout finding somewhere on line to ask and this seems to be the place.--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
